data.message: Eminem failed 9th grade 3 times he says, so all I’m saying is question who you are taking advice from, especially political advice, he is too far removed from a normal citizens life to even begin to understand the truth. Also, this is the same Eminem who talks about shooting up a school and gay bashing in songs, I advise to do your research before your praise.

replies.message: And you are following him be because...? Troll

Becky Myers-Lyons I’m happy you asked, it’s because I am a huge fan of his on most of his work. All I’m saying is if he repeats this type of hip hop, the album will be worse than Encore. He let politics ruin his art.
Hes always been political. You new?
Becky Myers-Lyons not that new, I’d say 80-90% of his work is not political, Encore yes, worst album of his career, and that is a FACKt.

So... You werent aware that he and his "real" fans chant Fuck Trump at his concerts? Just looks to me like he cares more about standing up against Trump than coddling to wishy washy fans. I call it integrity.
Becky Myers-Lyons it’s obvious he is trying to appeal to the younger, democratic crowd since his stardom isn’t what it used to be so he is pulling all strings to be relevant. I call it ignorance.
A performer that tell his fans to step up or step off doesnt appear desperate to me.
Becky Myers-Lyons drastic actions (like  drawing a line asking fans to choose between him and trump), usually stems from desperation.

Robin Hansen you are missing the point, his success comes from his talent in being a hip hop artist, just because he is successful financially doesn’t mean he is intelligent, especially in politics. Get educated.

https://youtu.be/3jFJTZkMc40
